mapper.select: SELECT b.cust_seq, b.cust_name, d.staff_nickname, c.style_name, a.reserv_seq, a.reserv_request, b.cust_phone, a.reserv_date, a.reserv_time, a.reserv_stat FROM T_RESERVATION AS a INNER JOIN T_CUSTOMER AS b ON a.cust_seq = b.cust_seq INNER JOIN T_HAIRSTYLE AS c ON a.style_seq = c.style_seq INNER JOIN T_STAFF AS d ON a.staff_seq = d.staff_seq WHERE a.shop_seq = #{a.shop_seq} ORDER BY a.reserv_date, a.reserv_time desc;
mapper.update: update T_RESERVATION set reserv_stat=#{reserv_stat} where reserv_seq=#{reserv_seq}
